titles.title: Daniel J. Evans Olympic National Park Wilderness Act
Daniel J. Evans Olympic National Park Wilderness Act
Daniel J. Evans Olympic National Park Wilderness Act
Daniel J. Evans Olympic National Park Wilderness Act
Daniel J. Evans Olympic National Park Wilderness Act
A bill to redesignate the Olympic Wilderness as the Daniel J. Evans Wilderness.
Daniel J. Evans Olympic National Park Wilderness Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 571.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 114-822.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 157.

action.text: Mr. Bishop (UT) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 3028.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 401 - 8, 2 Present (Roll no. 612).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the Senate passed version is repeated here.)
Daniel J. Evans Olympic National Park Wilderness Act
(Sec. 2) This bill amends the Washington Park Wilderness Act of 1988 to redesignate the Olympic Wilderness as the "Daniel J. Evans Wilderness."
